generalRules: Employees must not use pineapples more than 3 days a week.
Onions must not be peeled, washed or moved by employees more than once a day.
Employees always wash parsley and cucumbers in the sink before chopping them.
Employees must not place prepared pineapple on a plate.
Employees always wash their hands immediately after entering the kitchen.
Employees always cut carrots on rectangular cutting boards.
Employees always take out cucumbers from the fridge and potatoes from the cupboard.
Employees must not use carrots or cucumbers on Thursday.
Employees must not cut onions while onion peels are on the cutting board.
